traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The absorber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The absorber makes three attacks: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Mind Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 22 (4d10 damage) psychic damage.
